desc: FashionKart Plus is an online E-commerce portal focusing on Plus size kurtis where Indian women can buy kurtis and other ethnic wear like gown. kurti set, dress material and handbags. Fashionkart Plus is best place for women who are searching for All plus size kurtis online for ladies ( Ethnic Plus Kurtis).

layout.text: We have more products in Ethnic wear for men, women and children on our Fashionkart App which is available on Playstore
